name: Melody Master
description:
Melody Master is a VR interactive music game that is similar to Guitar Hero and Beat Saber but also different. The player must master the songs by understanding the melody, destroying the incoming objects at the perfect time. This game is a stationary game that does not require you to move around the physical world. It only requires you to move your head, arms, and hands. The game is stationed at a concert where you are the lead drummer. It is your debut so you have to impress the rest of the band or you will be fired. 

Controls: 

* Side trigger to hold the drum sticks. 

* Joysticks to rotate head and body. 

How To Play:

You have to hit the right drums based on the corresponding notes that come down. Your Hitting room is between the two horizontal black bars you see on the scale. 

Compatibility: 

This game is an andriod build (apk). The game was intended for Oculus Quest 2 VR headseat but may also be compatible with other VR headsets. To play game just download and enable developer mode to play installed game.
